verses.roman:
muñi chāra, more tumi saṅge lañā āilā
kṛpā kari' mora hāte 'prabhu' bhikṣā kailā

synonyms: muñi—I; chāra—most fallen; more—me; tumi—You; saṅge—with; lañā—taking; āilā—have come; kṛpā kari'-showing great mercy; mora hāte—from my hand; prabhu—my Lord; bhikṣā kailā—You accepted food.
translation: "Sir, I am most fallen, yet You have brought me with You. Showing great mercy, You have accepted food prepared by me.
